nodes.bodyText: @jpountz  Is this a correct assumption?  or could we start with iterators that are not on the same document?
this is the invariant between iterations indeed
can we avoid iterating over all sub iterators unless assertions are enabled?
I think we need to call something like assumeTrue(assertsAreEnabled) since this test requires assertions to be enabled to succeed.
Thanks @jpountz, very good point, addressed in bf9a3e8

can you revert the two arguments to assertEquals? it expects the expected value first and the actual value second. While swapping arguments doesn't cause major issues, it creates confusing error messages when the assertion fails.
Thanks @jpountz, my mistake, addressed in bf9a3e8
